mapper.sql: a.id, a.username, a.password, a.phone, a.email, a.created, a.updated
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tb_user AS a WHERE a.email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user ( username, password, email, phone, created, updated ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{created}, #{updated} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_user SET username = #{username}, password = #{password}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, updated = #{updated} WHERE id = #{id}
